Verses: 1 un Sagodharanaagiya Aaron Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadikku, Nee Aaronaiyum Avanodekooda Avan Kumaararaagiya Naadhaab, Abiyoo, Eleyaasaar, Iththaamaar Ennum Aaronin Kumaararaiyum Isravel Puththirarilirundhu Piriththu, Unnidaththil Serththukkolvaayaaga.
2 un Sagodharanaagiya Aaronukku, Magimaiyum Alangaaramumaai Irukkum Poruttu, Parisuththa Vasthirangalai Undupannuvaayaaga.

3 aaron Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyaththakkadhaaga Avanaip Parisuththappaduththumbadi Avanukku Vasthirangalai Undaakkumporuttu, Naan Gnaanaththin Aaviyaal Nirappina Vivegamaana Irudhayamulla Yaavarodum Nee Solluvaayaaga.

4 avargal Undaakkavendiya Vasthirangalaavana; Maarppadhakkamum, Epothdhum, Angiyum, Visiththiramaana Ulsattaiyum, Paagaiyum, Itaikkachchaiyume. Un Sagodharanaagiya Aaron Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadi, Avanukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Parisuththa Vasthirangalai Undupannavendum.
5 avargal Ponnum Ilaneelanoolum Raththaambaranoolum Sivappunoolum Melliya Panjunoolum Segarippaargalaaga.
6 epoththaip Ponninaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Visiththiravelaiyaaich Seyyakkadavargal.
7 adhu Ondraaga Inaikkappadum Poruttu, Irandu Tholththundugalinmelum Adhin Irandu Munaigalum Serkkappadavendum.

8 andha Epothdhinmel Irukkavendiya Visiththiramaana Kachchai Andha Velaikku Oppaagave, Ponninaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Pannappattu, Adhanode Egamaayirukkavendum.
9 pinnum Nee Irandu Komedhagak Kargalai Eduththu, Isravel Puththirarin Naamangalai Avaigalil Vettuvaayaaga.
10 avargal Pirandha Varisaiyinbadiye, Avargaludaiya Naamangalil Aaru Naamangal Oru Kallilum, Matra Aaru Naamangal Maru Kallilum Irukkavendum.
11 iraththinangalil Muththirai Vettukiravargal Seyyum Velaikku Oppaaga Andha Irandu Kargalilum Isravel Puththirarin Naamangalai Vetti, Avaigalaip Pon Kuvalaigalil Padhippaayaaga.

12 aaron Karththarukku Munbaagath Than Irandu Tholgalin Melum Isravel Puththirarin Naamangalai Gnaabakakkuriyaakach Sumandhuvara, Andha Irandu Kargalaiyum Epoththu Tholgalinmel Avargalai Ninaikkumbadiyaana Karkalaaga Vaikkakkadavaai.
13 ponninaal Valaiyangalaip Panni,
14 sariyaana Alavukkup Pinnal Velaiyaana Irandu Sangiligalaiyum Pasumponninaal Undaakki, Andhach Sangiligalai Andha Valaiyangalil Poottuvaayaaga.

15 niyaayavidhi Maarppadhakkaththaiyum Visiththira Velaiyaaich Seyvaayaaga; Adhai Epoththu Velaikku Oppaagap Ponninaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Seyvaayaaga.
16 adhu Sadhuramum Irattaiyum, Oru Jaan Neelamum Oru Jaan Agalamumaai Irukkavendum.
17 adhile Naalu Paththi Iraththinak Kargalai Niraiyap Padhippaayaaga; Mudhalaam Paththi Padhmaraagamum Pushparaagamum Maanikkamum,
18 irandaam Paththi Maragadhamum Indhiraneelamum Vachchiramum,
19 moondraam Paththi Kempum Vaitooriyamum Sugandhiyum,
20 naalaam Paththi Padikappachchaiyum Komedhagamum Yaspiyumaai Iruppadhaaga; Ivaigal Andhandhap Paththiyil Ponninaale Padhiththirukkavendum.

21 indhak Kargal Isravel Puththirarudaiya Naamangalinbadiye Pannirandum, Avargaludaiya Naamangal Avaigalil Vettappattavaigalumaai Irukkavendum; Pannirandu Koththirangalil Ovvondrinudaiya Naamam Ovvondrile Muththiraivettaai Vettiyirukkavendum.
22 maarppadhakkaththirku Adhin Pakkangalile Pinnalvelaiyaana Pasumpon Sangiligalaiyum Panni,
23 andha Maarppadhakkaththirku Irandu Pon Valaiyangalaiyum Panni, Andha Irandu Valaiyangalaiyum Maarppadhakkaththin Irandu Pakkangalile Vaiththu,
24 ponninaal Seydha Andha Irandu Pinnal Velaiyaana Sangiligalaiyum Maarppadhakkaththin Pakkangalil Irukkira Irandu Valaiyangalil Maatti,
25 avvirandu Pinnal Velaiyaana Sangiligalin Irandu Nunigalai Epoththuth Tholththundinmel Adhin Munpuraththil Irukkira Irandu Valaiyangalil Maattuvaayaaga.
26 nee Irandu Ponvalaiyangalaip Panni, Avaigalai Epoththin Keezhppuraththirku Edhiraana Maarppadhakkaththinudaiya Matra Irandu Pakkangalilum Adhinudaiya Oraththirkullaaga Vaiththu,
27 vere Irandu Ponvalaiyangalaip Panni, Avaigalai Epoththin Munpuraththu Irandu Keezhppakkangalil Adhin Inaippukku Edhiraakavum, Epoththin Visiththiramaana Kachchaikku Melaagavum Vaiththu,

28 maarppadhakkam Epoththin Visiththiramaana Kachchaikku Melaaga Irukkumbadikkum, Adhu Epoththilirundhu Neengaadhabadikkum, Adhai Adhin Valaiyangalaal Epoththu Valaiyangalode Ilaneela Naadaavinaal Kattavendum.

29 aaron Parisuththa Sthalaththirkul Piravesikkumpodhu, Isravel Puththirarin Naamangalaith Than Irudhayaththinmelirukkum Niyaayavidhi Maarppadhakkaththile Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Gnaabakakkuriyaaga Eppozhudhum Thariththukkollakkadavan.

30 niyaayavidhi Maarppadhakkaththile Ooreem Thummeem Enbavaigalai Vaippaayaaga; Aaron Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Piravesikkumbodhu, Avaigal Avan Irudhayaththinmel Irukkavendum; Aaron Than Irudhayaththinmel Isravel Puththirarudaiya Niyaayavidhiyaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhaanaththil Eppozhudhum Thariththukkollavendum.
31 epoththin Keezh Angiyai Muzhuvadhum Ilaneelanoolaal Undaakkakkadavaai.

32 thalai Nuzhaikira Adhin Thuvaaram Adhin Naduvil Irukkavum, Adhin Thuvaaraththukku Neyyappatta Velaiyaana Oru Naadaa Sutrilum Irukkavum Vendum; Adhu Kizhiyaadhabadikku Maarkkavasaththin Thuvaaraththukku Oththadhaaga Irukkavendum.

33 adhin Keezhorangalil Ilaneelanool Raththaambaranool Sivappunool Velaiyaal Seyyappatta Maadhalampazhangalaiyum, Avaigalukku Idaiyidaiye Sutrilum Ponmanikalaiyum Adhin Orangalil Sutrilum Thongumbadi Pannivaikkavendum.
34 angiyin Orangalil Sutrilum Oru Ponmaniyum Oru Maadhalampazhamum, Oru Ponmaniyum Oru Maadhalampazhamumaaith Thonguvadhaaga.

35 aaron Aaraadhanai Seyyak Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Piravesikkumbodhum, Veliye Varumbodhum, Avan Saagaadhabadikku, Adhin Saththam Ketkappadumbadi Adhaith Thariththukkollavendum.
36 pasumponninaal Oru Pattaththaip Panni Karththarukkup Parisuththam Endru Adhile Muththirai Vettaakavetti,
37 adhu Paakaiyilirukkumbadi Adhai Ilaneela Naadaavinaal Paakaiyin Mugappile Kattuvaayaaga.

38 isravel Puththirar Thangal Parisuththa Kaanikkaigalaagap Padaikkum Parisuththamaanavaigalin Thoshaththai Aaron Sumakkumbadi, Adhu Aaronudaiya Netriyinmel Iruppadhaaga; Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avargal Angikarikkappadumbadi, Adhu Eppozhudhum Avan Netriyin Mel Irukkavendum.
39 melliya Panjunoolaal Visiththiramaana Ulsattaiyaiyum, Melliya Panjunoolaal Paakaiyaiyum Undaakki, Idaikkachchaiyaich Chiththiraththaiyal Velaiyaagap Pannuvaayaaga.
40 aaronudaiya Kumaararukkum, Magimaiyum Alangaaramumaayirukkum Poruttu, Angigalaiyum, Idaikkachchaigalaiyum, Kullaakkalaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga.

41 un Sagodharanaagiya Aaronum Avanodekooda Avan Kumaararum Enakku Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyyumbadikku, Nee Andha Vasthirangalai Avargalukku Uduththi, Avargalai Abisheganjeydhu, Avargalaip Piradhishtaipanni, Avargalaip Parisuththappaduththuvaayaaga.
42 avargaludaiya Nirvaanaththai Moodumbadikku, Iduppuththodangi Muzhangaalmattum Uduththa Sanalnool Sallatangalaiyum Undupannuvaayaaga.

43 aaronum Avan Kumaararum Parisuththa Sthalaththile Aaraadhanaiseyya Aasarippuk Koodaaraththirkul Piravesikkumpodhum Balibeedaththandaikkuch Serumbodhum, Akkiramam Sumandhu Avargal Saagaadhabadikku, Avaigalaith Thariththirukkavendum; Idhu Avanukkum Avanukkup Pinvarum Sandhadhikkum Niththiya Kattalai.
